problems.problem name: Find All Occurrences Using KMP Algorithm
problems.description: Implement the Knuth-Morris-Pratt algorithm to find all occurrences of a given pattern in a given text.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a text string - inp1 and a pattern string - inp2.
problems.expected description: An array of starting indices where the pattern occurs in the text.

problems.problem name: Pattern Match with Wildcards Using KMP Algorithm
problems.description: Implement the Knuth-Morris-Pratt algorithm to find the first occurrence of a given pattern with wildcard characters in a given text. The wildcard character '?' can match any single character.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a text string - inp1 and a pattern string with wildcard characters - inp2.
problems.expected description: The starting index of the first occurrence of the pattern with wildcards in the text.
